Articles.Content:
It would be super cool to have a button that time warped to the next day or night for the current planet. Possible a sun or moon button that appeared next to the time warp display.  At the very least this would be super nice to have when at the space center, but optimally it could be done on any view and planetary surface. Though I'm not sure what these buttons would do while in orbit. They might go away when not valid. Or they would warp until the point at which the planetary body is no longer eclipsing the star from the crafts point of view.

In any case, the main problem I'd like to solve is when I'm trying to launch at day time, so I use time warp while sitting at the space station, and either have to wait a really long time, or overshoot. I only do one or the other. I never successfully time warp to morning.
I have occasionally warped successfully to a morning.
This was a feature in KSP1 (added rather late but still …) so hopefully it will be brought to KSP2 as well eventually.
